title: Plugging in $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: We must plug in $$x=4$$ and $$y=-1$$ into both inequalities and determine whether they are true. $$-1>4\left(4\right)-2$$ is false. So, the point is not a solution.
speech: We must plug in  x is equal to 4  and  y, is equal to negative 1  into both inequalities and determine whether they are true.  negative 1 is greater than, 4 times 4 minus 2  is false. So, the point is not a solution.
